attributes.action: Block facebook.com until Mark Zuckerberg gives evidence to CommonsCMS
attributes.additional_details:
The following webpages show information about other websites banned in the UK:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_websites_blocked_in_the_United_Kingdom
https://wiki.451unavailable.org.uk/wiki/Main_Page
http://www.ukispcourtorders.co.uk/
attributes.background:
The Digital, Culture, Media & Sport Committee recently asked Mark Zuckerberg to come and give evidence about Facebook's involvement with Cambridge Analytica. He refused to come.

Please pass a Commons motion saying that the Government should ask the High Court to block facebook.com until he comes.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It would be up to a court to decide whether a website should be blocked. The courts are independent of the Government and Parliament.
